product_name: The North Face Dottie Resolve Rain Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Dottie Resolve jacket gives girls a totally stylish and practical, waterproof option for a winter coat that can handle the weather. HyVent(R) 2-layer construction offers waterproof, breathable and fully seam-sealed protection. Mesh lining promotes breathability and doesn't feel clammy against skin. Brushed collar lining and chin guard flap provide a little extra coziness; hood rolls up to stow in collar. The North Face Dottie Resolve jacket has a center front zipper with a rip-and-stick stormflap, zippered hand pockets and elasticized cuffs. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Dottie Resolve jacket gives girls a totally stylish and practical, waterproof option for a winter coat that can handle the weather.
